stories.text:
Looking into web hosting companies, ideally with the following criteria:

- carbon neutral/responsible business operations

- relatively easy to contact company for support

- prioritizing privacy

1. Does anyone recommend a company that fits the profile?

2. Does the web host affect emails from my domain being delivered to other people’s spam?

3. Opinions on using a web host based in the EU due to privacy policies there vs. the US?

Here are past threads and some companies I’ve researched:

https://www.greengeeks.com/

https://www.nearlyfreespeech.net/

https://uberspace.de

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=21604544

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=9988817

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=5041578
stories.title: Web Hosting Questions
Nix: An idea whose time has come

stories.text:
[1] states:

> Similar to Windows 11 Home edition, Windows 11 Pro edition now requires internet connectivity. If you choose to setup device for personal use, MSA will be required for setup as well. You can expect Microsoft Account to be required in subsequent WIP flights.

[1]: https://blogs.windows.com/windows-insider/2022/02/16/announcing-windows-11-insider-preview-build-22557/
